about_the_game: This is a simulation game.There is a school scene inside. Players can control characters, visit the scenery of the classroom and enjoy some details of the classroom. They can use the WASD key to move, the space bar to jump, or move some tables.There are only movement and jumping functions in the game, players can move and jump in the classroom scene, visit the classroom scene from different angles, this is a simulation game, players can be used to visit, but also can be used to take photos.

They can use the WASD key to move, the space bar to jump, or move some tables.There are only movement and jumping functions in the game, players can move and jump in the classroom scene, visit the classroom scene from different angles, this is a simulation game, players can be used to visit, but also can be used to take photos.
name: Class Five Menorial GAME Demo
